Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I was hoping someone could point me in the right direction as to where I can upload a spacecraft for download. Whether it's on an external site or on the forum. I couldn't find a way on the actual spacecraft exchange so another site would be great.

Sincerely,

gtrusler

"If i were a pterodactyl, I wouldn't have killed over 20 million people!"-Joseph Stalin
Filing sharing sites like Mediafire will give you a download link you can include in your forum posts.
Agreed, Mediafire and other file sharing sites are perhaps the best place. If the craft becomes very popular people may ask you to upload to to the SpacePort.

It's worth checking big company's free hosting sites as you might already have and account with them, such as Skydrive (Xbox/Hotmail/Microsoft accounts) or Google Drive, and you won't need to create a new one.
